nodes.text: The Jungle Racer was a shuttle that was used by the Cularin Militia during the time of the Clone Wars.

In about 20 BBY, the Cularin Militia intelligence officer Major Xirossk summoned a group of freelance agents to meet with him aboard the Militia Carrack-class light cruiser Cularin 1, and he sent the Jungle Racer to transport the agents to the vessel from Hedrett Groundport, a spaceport on the planet Cularin.

The Jungle Racer was created by Rob Edwards and it appears in Uffel's Prisoners, a role-playing adventure that forms part of the Inside-out trilogy of the Living Force campaign. During the module, if the player characters do not have a starship of their own in which they can fly to Cularin 1, Xirossk dispatches the Jungle Racer to transport them to the vessel.
